{{Actor| | type = Internal | name = Sector action | class = SectorAction }}[[Classes]]: {{Class}} → SectorAction
 →{{Class|MusicChanger}}
 →{{Class|SecActEnter}}
 →{{Class|SecActExit}}
 →{{Class|SecActEyesAboveC}}
 →{{Class|SecActEyesBelowC}}
 →{{Class|SecActEyesDive}}
 →{{Class|SecActEyesSurface}}

Base class for all sector action classes. This thing is not used directly, instead one of its derived classes is used. See also: [[Thing executed specials]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SectorAction native { +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} +{{Flag|NOSECTOR}} +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} +{{Flag|DONTSPLASH}} }
